item.title: How to setup a local pypi mirror
item.description: It is quite easy to set up a local pypi server. Some details can be found here. You can also use devpi if you prefer but it seems overly complicated for a job that is easily achieved by pip. Let’s look at how to use pip for local installation. Firstly, it is possible to install all requirements beforehand in a separate directory. We can use the following commands: pip install --download DIR -r requirements.
